start.description:
You are standing next to a river bank.
There is a hill south of here. You see wilderness in the east.

objects.bank: Rocks and pebbles.  You notice an old rusty knife near the water line.
objects.hill: Looks like a low hill, perhaps you should get closer to it.

grotto_entry.description:
You reached the hill.
You can see a cave on the side.

eastwild.description:
You're about to get lost in the wildeness.
There's a river bank to the west
